scripts.build: rm -r dist/* && yarn make && yarn uglify && cp -r css dist && cp docs/index.* dist && cp docs/config.js dist && cp -r docs/2018 dist
scripts.deploy: tar -zcvf build.tar.gz dist && scp build.tar.gz hetzner:/tmp/ && rm build.tar.gz && ssh hetzner 'cd /home/michiel/vps/web/www/uitslagen.wtos.nl/ && rm -r * && tar -xvf /tmp/build.tar.gz && mv dist/* . && rm -r dist'
